message: The next day窶婦ell, according to the clock; it's still night outside, of course窶肘 get up, grab Ren, and leave the room.
Looking for something to wet my throat, I go to the den and open the fridge by the bar counter.
It's full of fruits and vegetables and other ingredients.
This must be stuff Clear got at that supermarket he mentioned.
Come to think of it, where is Clear? Is he up already?
I grab a fruit in lieu of breakfast and poke my head into Clear's room.
...It's empty.
I lean over the handrail to check the first floor. No one's home.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where'd he go?"

name: 蓮
message: "If you mean Clear, he went out a little while ago."

name: 蒼葉
message: "He went out?"
I have a bad feeling about this, especially after that run-in with those yakuza yesterday...
Just as I decide to call him, my Coil rings.
It's Clear.

name: クリア
message: "Hello? Master?"
His voice is very quiet, like he's speaking in a whisper.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear, where are you?"

name: クリア
message: "Please listen, Master. I've somehow gotten inside Oval Tower."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What?"

name: クリア
message: "I've successfully infiltrated the building."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You got in?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. I'll send you a map showing the route to take. Please come quickly."

name: クリア
message: "I have to hang up now. Mustn't be spotted. Bye."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Hey, wait! Clear!"
Immediately after he hangs up, a message comes through.
...He sent me a child's drawing.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell am I supposed to do with this..."
I wonder if he actually got inside.
I mean, is it that easy?
Then again, this is Clear we're talking about...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Guess I'd better check it out."
I put Ren in my bag and leave Glitter.
